item.title: Clan wars portal REP++
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:
@PriMaL_PvP wrote:

Hey Guys, im trying to make my clan wars portal tele me to the battle feild, when i was doing it i got really confused there are 2 portals in the clan wars area and both of them are the same ids how can i make 1 portal lead to one location and the other to another locationswitch(objectType) { case 28213: c.getPA().movePlayer(3299, 3722, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome To Clan Wars, You Will Not Lose Your Items In This Mini-Game!"); break;
Any help Rep++
